intro:
A Purrfect Blend of Bag Management & Auto-Battling!
Dive into a light roguelite adventure where strategic backpack management meets addictive auto-chess combat!
description:
Expand your pack, organize, combine, and store magical summoning stones, and build an unstoppable Legion of Cats! Your choices shape the story's ending – forge your own path!

Choose Your Hero, Forge Your Fate:
Pick your champion and power them up on your journey! Learn devastating new abilities and unlock unique upgrades as you explore diverse paths to victory. Lead your feline forces to triumph!

Master Your Backpack, Master the Game:
Your pack is EVERYTHING! Unlock 200+ unique items, but remember: No backpack, no victory! Continuously expand your storage and strategically arrange your gear. Use your stones to summon mighty cat units onto the battlefield!

Shop 'Til You Drop!
Visit the store and splurge your hard-earned coins! Fill your pack to the brim with game-changing loot!

Command a Purrfect Army:
Recruit from 15+ distinct feline unit types! Craft powerful stones using unique recipes to summon even mightier cat recruits! Experiment and build synergistic team compositions (comps) to crush challenging foes!

Unleash Arcane Power:
Collect magical spell scrolls to unleash game-changing abilities and dramatically turn the tide of battle!
